title: Asynchronous Online Learning Design for Saudi Elementary Social Studies Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and knowledge of social studies content
context.additional_context: Customized online learning design for social studies teachers over 40, requiring practical content tailored to professional characteristics and optimized smartphone-based accessibility

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to share educational experiences with peer teachers via asynchronous discussion forums in mobile environments.
Learners understand three content structuring principles applicable to Saudi educational contexts at a practical level.
Learners acquire methods to analyze learner engagement using formative assessment tools (quizzes, learning journals).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
